meanings.sent1: The baby would pule when she wanted her mother.
meanings.sent2: Sometimes, children pule when they are tired.
meanings.sent3: The kitten would pule for attention whenever someone walked by.
meanings.sent4: As the wind howled outside, the old house seemed to pule in response.
meanings.sent5: The lost puppy continued to pule until it was found by its owner.

meanings.sent1: The pule of the kitten was heard throughout the house.
meanings.sent2: The pule of the puppy tugged at the heartstrings of the passersby.
meanings.sent3: The pule of the ghostly figure in the movie made the audience jump.
meanings.sent4: Amidst the silence of the night, a distant pule echoed in the forest.
meanings.sent5: The pule of the wind through the trees created a haunting melody.
